hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Salamah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) at (meat from) a shoulder, then Bilal came to him and he went out to pray, and he did not touch water

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا غَيَّرَتِ النَّارُ
chapter.eng-name: Not Performing Wudu' From That Which Has Been Altered By Fire
